title: [Large-Scale] Productive Failure Learning Through Electronic Textile Design Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical circuit concepts, basic hand-sewing skills, and experience in creative problem-solving
context.additional_context: Students search e-textile design materials on personal devices (BYOD) while engaging in small-group activities for collaborative problem-solving. Social interaction and learning outcomes are reinforced through sharing and analyzing failure cases

learning_goals: Students can identify and explain three or more types of errors occurring in the e-textile fabrication process
Students can creatively propose two or more alternative solutions by analyzing failure cases
Students can improve their design prototype at least once based on peer assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
